events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and our team is excited to review your credentials carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department, specifically for the software developer role in our backend team.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps.
Your initial screening interview was successfully completed, and our team was impressed with your experience in software development.
Thank you for promptly providing your availability for the next technical interview; we appreciate your enthusiasm and responsiveness.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 7th at 14:00 UTC with one of our senior software engineers.
The technical interview was completed successfully; you demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and sound coding knowledge.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10:00 UTC to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your communication skills and alignment with our company values.
We have proposed a competitive offer for the software engineer position outlining salary, benefits, and start date options.
The candidate responded positively to the offer, expressing enthusiasm and requesting a few clarifications regarding the onboarding process.
The candidate has formally accepted the job offer and is excited to join the engineering team.
Onboarding has started smoothly with the candidate receiving access to systems and scheduling orientation sessions.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with the new software engineer fully integrated into the team.
